articles.title: Virat Kohli's NEW Restaurant in Kishore Kumar's BUNGALOW is Super Swanky | VIRAL PICS - India.com
articles.description: Star Indian cricketer Virat Kohli has converted legendary singer Kishore Kumar's old bungalow -- 'Gouri Kunj' -- into a swanky restaurant and he on Wednesday gave the fans a glimpse of his new venture. Here are the photos of Virat Kohli's Bunglow.
